alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:17PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Custer, northwestern Oglala Lakota and south central Pennington Counties through 1100 PM MDT... At 1017 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Custer State Park to 5 miles southeast of Fairburn to 6 miles south of Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Red Shirt and Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads around 1025 PM MDT. Hayward and Red Shirt Table Overlook around 1030 PM MDT. Hermosa and Rockerville around 1035 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Rapid City, Folsom, Hart Ranch, Reptile Gardens, Bear Country, Thompson Butte, Farmingdale, Black Gap, Railroad Buttes, Rapid Valley, Caputa, Rapid City Airport, Sheep Mountain Table and Scenic. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 57 and 58. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM MDT for southwestern and west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City
